languages.text: "Не вам судить мой Дом, {name} фон Валанциус. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".

traits.locale_text: "Не вам судить мой Дом, {name} фон Валанциус. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
languages.original_text: "Не вам судить мой Дом, {name} фон Валанциус. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".

traits.locale_text: "You are poorly suited to judge the merits my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours well, and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたにオーセリオ家の真価を評価する資格はありません、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様。あなたの魂の色が嫌と言うほど見えますよ。影よりも暗い色をたっぷり内に秘めています」
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたにオーセリオ家の真価を評価する資格はありません、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様。あなたの魂の色が嫌と言うほど見えますよ。影よりも暗い色をたっぷり内に秘めています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你没有资格评判我的家族，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。我已经看穿了你灵魂的色彩，你的灵魂也不乏阴暗的部分。”
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: “你没有资格评判我的家族，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。我已经看穿了你灵魂的色彩，你的灵魂也不乏阴暗的部分。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|le|la} mieux {mf|placé|placée} pour juger des mérites de ma maison, {name} von Valancius. Je peux voir les teintes de votre âme, et certaines sont bien plus sombres qu'elles ne le devraient. »
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|le|la} mieux {mf|placé|placée} pour juger des mérites de ma maison, {name} von Valancius. Je peux voir les teintes de votre âme, et certaines sont bien plus sombres qu'elles ne le devraient. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No está cualificad{mf|o|a} para juzgar los méritos de mi casa, {name} von Valancius. Puedo ver perfectamente los colores de su alma y sé que está plagada de sombras».
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: «No está cualificad{mf|o|a} para juzgar los méritos de mi casa, {name} von Valancius. Puedo ver perfectamente los colores de su alma y sé que está plagada de sombras».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht qualifiziert, über mein Haus zu urteilen, {name} von Valancius. Ihr kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehr gut sehen, und sie trägt reichlich dunkle Töne in sich."
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht qualifiziert, über mein Haus zu urteilen, {name} von Valancius. Ihr kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehr gut sehen, und sie trägt reichlich dunkle Töne in sich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hanemin faziletleri hususunda yargıda bulunacak vasıftan yoksunsun {name} von Valancius. Ruhunun renklerini gayet iyi görebiliyorum. Ruhun pek çok karanlık renk barındırıyor."
languages.original_text: "You are ill-qualified to judge the merits of my House, {name} von Valancius. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: "Hanemin faziletleri konusunda yargıya varmaya vasıfların yetmez {name} von Valancius. Ruhunun renklerini gayet iyi görebiliyorum. Ruhunda pek çok karanlık renk barındırıyorsun."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
